channel.title: Hugo on Confirm4Crit
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Confirm4Crit

item.title: Hugo Impressions
item.description:
Been fiddling with Hugo the past week, tweaking the site here and there to fit what I need.

It’s been exciting hosting my own little site to hold all of me. Resume, portfolio, personal thoughts, etc. I had too much moving around, Tumblr, Twitter, all my AscendedAlpaca blogs, etc. Nice just to have it all here.

I also got my first pull request excepted. It’s insignificant, but it was need feeling contributing to a project.

Here it is, if anyone cares. I added a Tumblr social link on my own to the side bar, so I figured to slap in on the main theme, and it got accepted.

Feels neat.

item.title: My First Post with Hugo
item.description: This is my first post fiddling with Hugo. Seems like a great tool for this blog. Yay!
